text: La serpenta canta is a live performance album by avant-garde musician Diamanda Galás, released on 24 November 2003 by Mute Records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Diamanda Galás – vocals, piano, arrangement ;Production and additional personnel *Blaise Dupuy – production, mixing *Rex Ray – design *Austin Young – photography ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! title: La serpenta canta
